PlaceholderDesc_Id: Id of the field. <VALUE_NAME> must be replaced using the name of the field.
PlaceholderDesc_Name: Name of the field. <VALUE_NAME> must be replaced using the name of the field.
PlaceholderDesc_Value: Value of the field. <VALUE_NAME> must be replaced using the name of the field.
PlaceholderDesc_UnescapedValue: Value of the field. <VALUE_NAME> must be replaced using the name of the field. Escape settings will not be used here.
PlaceholderDesc_Type: Type of the field. Can be "string", "number" or "option". <VALUE_NAME> must be replaced using the name of the field. If the field does not exist "MISSING" will be returned.
PlaceholderDesc_Exists: true if the field exists, else false.
